text: "You Made Me the Thief of Your Heart" is a 1994 song by Irish singer Sinéad O'Connor and was taken from the 1993 movie In the Name of the Father. It went to number 42 in the United Kingdom, number 52 in Scotland, number 4 in Ireland, number 9 in the Netherlands, number 24 in New Zealand, number 19 in Finland and number 43 in Australia. ==Track listing== * UK, CD single (1994) # "You Made Me the Thief of Your Heart" (7-inch edit) – 4:45 # "You Made Me the Thief of Your Heart" (12-inch Stained mix) – 6:26 # "You Made Me the Thief of Your Heart" (album instrumental version) – 5:49 # "The Father and His Wife the Spirit" – 2:27 ==References== Category:1994 songs Category:Sinéad O'Connor songs
title: You Made Me the Thief of Your Heart
